Pepi Sonuga (amụrụ Stephanie Sonuga, [ihe  dị  Septemba 8, 1993), bụ onye Naijiria na-American na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ dị ka Lacey Emery na Starz horror-comedy series usoro ihe nkiri ntoọchi dị ụjọ bụ Ash vs Evil Dead (2016) na Tangey Turner na Freeform drama series Famous in Love (2017–2018).
A mụrụ Sonuga site na nna si Yoruba na nne si Igbo nọ na Lagos, Naijiria,wee kwaga Los Angeles, California mgbe ọ dị afọ iri. Na mgbanwe ahụ, Sonuga kwuru, "O siri ike ime mgbanwe
Amaghị m ọtụtụ ihe banyere America n'ezie, o doro anya na enwere m nnukwu olu ndị
Ọ na-esiri m ike dịka a na-emegbu m
" Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Sonuga sonyeere n'mmemme ma akpọrọ  ya Miss Teen Los Angeles
Ọ malitekwara ịme ihe ngosi maka ụdị dị ka Forever 21, Hot Topic, na Skechers Ọ gara Culver City High School na California.
